languages.text: "Лучше Звездно{rt_mf|му|й} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же} на глаза не попадаться. Кто знает, что у них, дворян, в голове. Оскорблю своим видом... А мне моя голова дорога еще!"
languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует патентованное чмо
Пузатый простолюдин

traits.locale_text: "Лучше Звездно{mf|му|й} Госпо{mf|дину|же} на глаза не попадаться. Кто знает, что у них, аристократов, в голове. Оскорблю своим видом... А мне моя голова дорога еще!"

languages.translation_comment:
проверка каунтера: если превалирует патентованное чмо
Пузатый простолюдин

languages.text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"
languages.original_text: "Лучше Звездно{rt_mf|му|й} Госпо{rt_mf|дину|же} на глаза не попадаться. Кто знает, что у них, дворян, в голове. Оскорблю своим видом... А мне моя голова дорога еще!"

traits.locale_text: "I'd rather stay out of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads of theirs. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

"I'd rather stay out of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads of theirs. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

"I'd rather stay out of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

"I'd rather stay out of the Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

"I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

"I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

languages.text: “我看，我还是离那位来自上界的大人远点吧，谁知道{rt_mf|他|她}那颗尊贵的脑袋里想些什么呢？万一我的长相碍了{rt_mf|他|她}的眼……我可不想因为这个掉脑袋！”
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: “我看，我还是离那位来自上界的大人远点吧，谁知道{rt_mf|他|她}那颗尊贵的脑袋里想些什么呢？万一我的长相碍了{rt_mf|他|她}的眼……我可不想因为这个掉脑袋！”

languages.text: «Preferiría no cruzarme con {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial}. A saber qué pasa por esa cabeza de noble... Imaginaos si mi apariencia le ofendiera... ¡prefiero que mi cabeza siga donde está!».
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: «Preferiría no cruzarme con {rt_mf|el Señor Celestial|la Señora Celestial}. A saber qué pasa por esa cabeza de noble... Imaginaos si mi apariencia le ofendiera... ¡prefiero que mi cabeza siga donde está!».

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} yolundan uzak durmayı tercih ederim. O soylu kafalarda neler döndüğünü kim bilir. Farz et ki görünümüm onu gücendirdi... Kafamdan ayrılmak istemiyorum!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuzun|Leydimizin} yolundan uzak durmayı tercih ederim. O soylu kafalarda neler döndüğünü kim bilir. Farz et ki görünümüm onu gücendirdi... Kafamdan ayrılmak istemiyorum!"

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}には関わらない方がいいだろう。こんな貴族の頭の中で何が起こるか誰にも分からない。もしかしたら、俺の見た目が{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の気に障るかもしれない…まだ首を切られたくはないね！」
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}には関わらない方がいいだろう。こんな貴族の頭の中で何が起こるか誰にも分からない。もしかしたら、俺の見た目が{rt_mf|彼|彼女}の気に障るかもしれない…まだ首を切られたくはないね！」

languages.text: « Je préfère rester aussi loin que possible de {rt_mf|ce Seigneur|cette Seigneure} Céleste. Qui sait ce qui se passe dans la tête de ces nobles ? Si ça se trouve, mon apparence même est une offense pour eux... Je tiens à ma tête, moi, merci beaucoup ! »
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: « Je préfère rester aussi loin que possible de {rt_mf|ce Seigneur|cette Seigneure} Céleste. Qui sait ce qui se passe dans la tête de ces nobles ? Si ça se trouve, mon apparence même est une offense pour eux... Je tiens à ma tête, moi, merci beaucoup ! »

languages.text: "Ich halte mich von {rt_mf|diesem himmlischen Herrn|dieser himmlischen Herrin} lieber fern. Wer weiß, was in den Köpfen dieser Adeligen vor sich geht? Vielleicht beleidigt mein Aussehen {rt_mf|ihn|sie} ja ... Ich möchte meinen Kopf noch ein wenig behalten!"
languages.original_text: "I'd rather stay out of that Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady}'s way. Who knows what goes on in those noble heads. Suppose my appearance offends {rt_mf|him|her}... I'd rather not part with my own head just yet!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte mich von {rt_mf|diesem himmlischen Herrn|dieser himmlischen Herrin} lieber fern. Wer weiß, was in den Köpfen dieser Adeligen vor sich geht? Vielleicht beleidigt mein Aussehen {rt_mf|ihn|sie} ja ... Ich möchte meinen Kopf noch ein wenig behalten!"
